physDesc.additional: Scirpt: 'bru tsha. Lines per folio: 9; 10 on fol. 4a; 7 on fol. 5a. Orthography: - Numerals used for numbers - Frequent abbreviations (e.g., for thams cad, bcom ldan 'das, etc.) - Bindu for m - Always a tsheg before shad (or double shad)

lg.l: de ltar sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don chen sgran ||

chos 'jig
ces ltar snang ba mang po yis ||
zhing 'dir ring por mi thogs zhub'dub/zhub (?) 'gyur bas ||

skyes bu spyad ldan rnaMs kyi brtson 'grus
gyis ||
ga gzhung 'di chos kyi snying po la spyod kyang ||
'jig rten kun gyis cir mi shes pa'i ||

dge slong seng ges
snyigs ma'i mi rnams la ||
rang gi rnaM thar gtam du bsnyad pa yin ||
bstan pa'i gzhi dang rgyas dbye' bsgrub pa la |
yang dag yang dag ma yin rnam dbye' dang ||
cha rang gyi kun spyod gtam pa rnaM lnga 'di ||

shag kya'i bstan la rnaM
dag byi dor yin ||
